items.name: case powerDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the power state of any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case ssidDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the current SSID of any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case bssidDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the current BSSID of any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case countryCodeDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the adopted country code of any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case linkDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the link state for any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case linkQualityDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the RSSI or transmit rate for any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case modeDidChange
items.desc: Posts when the operating mode of any Wi-Fi interface changes.

items.name: case scanCacheUpdated
items.desc: Posts when the scan cache of any Wi-Fi interface is updated with new scan results.
